summary: A once-timid young woman gains newfound confidence after a failed marriage, much to the chagrin of her miserable family.
cast: Lois Wilson|Milton Sills|Theodore Roberts|Helen Ferguson|Mabel Van Buren|Mae Giraci|Clarence Burton|Ethel Wales|Taylor Graves|Charles Ogle|Peaches Jackson|Carrie Clark Ward
keywords: national film registry|bigamy|pulitzer prize source|based on novel|based on play
title: Miss Lulu Bett
